languages.text: "Клеменциа". {n}Абеляр сдержанно кивает. При ответном кивке леди-канцлера морщины на его лбу едва заметно разглаживаются.{/n}
"Clementia." {n}Abelard offers a reserved nod. She nods in return, and the lines on his brow soften ever so slightly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Клеменциа". {n}Абеляр сдержанно кивает. При ответном кивке леди-канцлера морщины на его лбу едва заметно разглаживаются.{/n}

languages.text: “克莱门缇雅。”{n}阿贝拉德微微点了点头，克莱门缇雅也点头回应。阿贝拉德的眉毛略微舒展了些。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Clementia." {n}Abelard offers a reserved nod. She nods in return, and the lines on his brow soften ever so slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “克莱门缇雅。”{n}阿贝拉德微微点了点头，克莱门缇雅也点头回应。阿贝拉德的眉毛略微舒展了些。{/n}

languages.text: «Clementia». {n}Abelard asiente con gesto reservado. Cuando ella le devuelve el gesto, las arrugas de su frente se suavizan levemente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Clementia." {n}Abelard offers a reserved nod. She nods in return, and the lines on his brow soften ever so slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Clementia». {n}Abelard asiente con gesto reservado. Cuando ella le devuelve el gesto, las arrugas de su frente se suavizan levemente.{/n}

languages.text: 「クレメンティア」{n}アベラルドが控えめに一礼する。彼女が返礼すると、彼の眉間のしわが少しばかり和らいだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Clementia." {n}Abelard offers a reserved nod. She nods in return, and the lines on his brow soften ever so slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「クレメンティア」{n}アベラルドが控えめに一礼する。彼女が返礼すると、彼の眉間のしわが少しばかり和らいだ。{/n}

languages.text: "Clementia." {n}Abelard nickt ihr reserviert zu. Sie erwidert die Geste, und die Falten auf seiner Stirn glätten sich kaum merklich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Clementia." {n}Abelard offers a reserved nod. She nods in return, and the lines on his brow soften ever so slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Clementia." {n}Abelard nickt ihr reserviert zu. Sie erwidert die Geste, und die Falten auf seiner Sterne glätten sich kaum merklich.{/n}

languages.text: « Clémentia, » {n}salue Abélard avec un signe de tête réservé. Ses traits s'adoucissent imperceptiblement quand elle lui répond d'un hochement de tête équivalent.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Clementia." {n}Abelard offers a reserved nod. She nods in return, and the lines on his brow soften ever so slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Clémentia, » {n}salue Abélard avec un signe de tête réservé. Ses traits s'adoucissent imperceptiblement quand elle lui répond d'un hochement de tête équivalent.{/n}

languages.text: "Clementia." {n}Abelard vakurca başını eğiyor. Clementia da karşılık olarak aynısını yapıyor ve Abelard'ın alnındaki çizgiler çok hafif yumuşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Clementia." {n}Abelard offers a reserved nod. She nods in return, and the lines on his brow soften ever so slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Clementia." {n}Abelard hafifçe başını eğiyor, Clementia da karşılık olarak aynısını yapıyor, Abelard'ın kaşlarının üzerindeki çizgiler çok hafif yumuşuyor.{/n}
